Strings.Text: {scroll 2}Some kind of observation\nsystem is running.{clear 0}It seems to have been\ninstalled recently.

{scroll 2}
There's a security system.{clear 0}‟System power: Stand-by 
mode. Water check: Error.”{clear 0}‟Manual verification is 
required to unlock.”

{scroll 2}
There's a security system.{clear 0}‟System power: Stand-by 
mode. Water check: OK.”{clear 0}‟Manual verification is 
required to unlock.”

{scroll 2}
There's a security system.{clear 0}‟System power: OK.
Water check: Error.”{clear 0}‟Manual verification is 
required to unlock.”
{scroll 2}\nThere's a security system.{clear 0}‟System power: OK.\nWater check: OK.”
